subject: Standard Request for Proposal (RFP) for National Highways and centrally sponsored road works proposed to be implemented on EPC Mode of Contract - Amendments to RFP - reg.
text: MRay <4y TTHNf qfererot (Tsq 9Rdev &r RTHPf HATT4,  4RTT TYTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tria 7 0fl-5 Qa 6, dacr-10, ERaT, #f @ocf}f 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TT/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/2022 Policy Circular No_ 11.38/2022 dated 17th June, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/EPC/2020 (Computer No: 46753)} Sub.: Standard Request for Proposal (RFP) for National Highways and centrally sponsored road works proposed to be implemented on EPC Mode of Contract Amendments to RFP- reg: MoRTH vide circular No.RW/NH-35014/35/2020-H(Part-IV) (Comp. no_ 208779) dated 31.05.2022 and corrigendum dated 06.06.2022 has issued amendment in RFP for EPC projects. copy of aforesaid circulars is attached herewith for information and compliance  2. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As above_ 12/6/22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AIl Officers of NHAI HQV ROs/ PIUsl CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi: 2 .
